${modID}:MoldedSand.NAME: Molded Sand
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal and receive double attack damage.

${modID}:Eggshells.NAME: Eggshells
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards you draw during your first turn are #yUpgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:TheNail.NAME: The Nail
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing a card #yUpgrades it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:TheNeedle.NAME: The Needle
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing an #yAttack converts #b1 #yStrength to #yDexterity. Playing a #ySkill converts #b1 #yDexterity to #yStrength.

${modID}:LineGraph.NAME: Line Graph
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b

${modID}:LetterpressStamp.NAME: Letterpress Stamp
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat is played twice.

${modID}:MummifiedFoot.NAME: Mummified Foot
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat costs #b0.
